txt.en: Thórth suspects that whoever is leading the Dourhands at the Icereave Mines is hiding in a locked area within the mines.
'I'll need to heat it a bit before I shape it.'

'Attacks from those thin-beards is no small matter, [placeholder]. They are organized -- they must have supplies, and a plan, and a leader to be this far north.

'I found some old maps of the Icereave Mines, and one of them shows a room inside. If I were the wagering sort, I would lay my money on those Dourhands planning to take over the mines, and that their leader would be claiming that particular area as his own.

'You will need to find a key. Perhaps one of the other Dourhands might have one?'
The Icereave Mines lie to the south-west of Zigilgund.\n\nThórth has asked you to drive the Dourhands from the Icereave Mines.

'Excellent work! Let's take a look at it....

'Oh blast, the key is bent! Ah, well. Not to worry... I think I can fix it.

'Hold on a moment....'
Thórth is at Zigilgund.\n\nYou should return to Thórth with news of your victory.
'You will need to find the key to the locked place in the mines, [placeholder]. I would guess one of the Dourhands might have one....'
'You will be getting into no locked rooms without a key. I suggest you go find it.'
Take a key from a Dourhand within the ancient Icereave Mines
Wait while Thórth finishes his work
Take a key from a Dourhand within the Icereave Mines
